+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8277531
+ * @requires os.family == "windows"
+ * @summary os+thread output should contain actual thread size for thread start
+ * @library /test/lib
+ */
+import jdk.test.lib.process.OutputAnalyzer;
+import jdk.test.lib.process.ProcessTools;
+
+public class TestLogThreadStackSize {
+
+    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
+
+        ProcessBuilder pb = ProcessTools.createJavaProcessBuilder("-Xlog:os+thread", "-version");
+        OutputAnalyzer output = ProcessTools.executeProcess(pb);
+        output.shouldMatch("Thread \".*\" started .*stacksize: [0-9]*K")
+              .shouldNotMatch("Thread \".*\" started .*stacksize: default");
+    }
+
+}
